DOC.brief_summary: The aim study ass safety tolerance new ferment food versus control product healthy adult 4-week consumption period .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Dose-effect New Fermented Food Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Subjects receive full description study , provide write informed consent take part study . Freeliving subject , evaluated clinical examination . Male/female subject age 18 55 year ( bound include ) . Subjects body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 ≤ BMI < 30kg/m² . Healthy subject ( determine medical examination ) Subjects allergy ( food , respiratory… ) . Subjects surgery intervention require general anaesthesia last 4 week . Subjects history chronic metabolic gastrointestinal disease exception appendectomy . Subjects chronic iatrogenic immunodeficiency ( e.g . Chemotherapy , HIV ) . Subjects present severe evolutive chronic pathology ( e.g . cancer , tuberculosis , Crohn 's disease , cirrhosis , multiple sclerosis , Type I diabetes… ) . Subject eat disorder . Subjects cardiac , respiratory ( include asthma ) renal insufficiency , cardiomyopathy , valvulopathy medical history rheumatic fever . Subjects special medicate diet ( obesity , anorexia , metabolic pathology… ) . For female subject : pregnancy , breastfeed willing use/not use acceptable method contraception Subject , Investigator 's opinion , randomise .
